org.drip.param.product

Class BondCFTerminationEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.analytics.core.Serializer
      • org.drip.param.product.BondCFTerminationEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Validatable

    public class BondCFTerminationEvent
extends Serializer
implements Validatable
    This class contains the current "liveness" state of the bond, and, if inactive, how it entered that state.
